nodes.text: An Outstanding Pilot (French: Une pilote hors pair) is a chapter book adaptation of the Star Wars Rebels episode "Wings of the Master". An Outstanding Pilot was published by Hachette Jeunesse on June 29, 2016.

Weakened during a supply mission, the Rebels must reinforce their fleet… and quickly! Luckily, Rex knows an engineer who has developed an extraordinary fighter capable of competing with Imperial ships. But the latter refuses to entrust his device to Hera. To convince him, the courageous Twi'lek will have to prove to him that she is not an ordinary pilot…
